name: Raresh's Linux Distribution
short_description:
Raresh's Linux Distribution is the result of ZintoriOS (this why the first released version is a 2.0)

It is an easy to use Ubuntu-based Linux distribution which is stylish and (typically) makes sense to both Windows and OS X users.

It uses XFCE to provide the default UI which is customizable to any user's liking and it also contains LXDE (not finished) for computers with hardware that requires lighter UI elements.

The project is in late development (Release Candidates) and you might see many 'BETA' stickers. Don't worry, it is ready for production use (as long as your not using LXDE) and keep in mind that until the final RTM pops up, you may need to frequently update it!
summary: Fast, easy to use Linux-based operating system
